level.heading: Washington Stock Exchange.
level.text: The Washington Stock Exchange, through its president or treasurer, shall pay to the Collector of Taxes of the District of Columbia a sum equal to $500 per annum in lieu of tax on the members thereof for business done on said exchange.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Office of Collector of Taxes abolished: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-401.
